synopsis.text: This short anime is a creative collaboration between acclaimed directors Mamoru Oshii and Koji Morimoto and the technology company KENWOOD. It serves as a promotional piece for KENWOOD's new smart headset product that features AI assistant technology. The animation depicts a futuristic fictional city where smart devices with voice control have become ubiquitous. Through artistic visual storytelling, it offers a glimpse into how people might interact with and utilize this type of headset technology as part of their everyday lives. While showcasing the capabilities of the headset, the anime also puts forth a thought-provoking interpretation of a potential tech-driven future. With imagination and visual flair, it aims to interest viewers in both the KENWOOD product specifically and innovative wearable tech more broadly.
